General.Name: La Française des Jeux Société anonyme
General.Description: La Française des Jeux Société anonyme operates lottery, and online and PoS sports betting games in France and internationally. The company offers instant and draw games, as well as online poker. It also provides risk management services for sports betting operators; and operates a digital gaming platform. The company was founded in 1933 and is headquartered in Boulogne-Billancourt, France.
General.Address: 3-7 Quai du Point du Jour, Boulogne-Billancourt, France, 92100
